reviewText: I gave this as a gift to a painter.  She absolutely loves it!
A relaxing teacher.
Whats to say? I love Bob Ross and following along with his relaxing DVD's is the cheapest therapy that I can find. :)
My husband is enjoying both of these DVDs.
Bob Ross was a fabulous teacher.  I enjoy the DVDs immensely.
Great, just like all other Bob Ross Products! Beautiful painting instructions.
I wish there were more of these available! Bob Ross is amazing!
These videos are amazing and such a joy to watch!!
A classic! We are very satisfied with this set of DVDs.
gift
I learn so much from looking at his lessons.  Great!
This seems nice. I have other Bob Ross DVD'S. Maybe I'll get this.
Bought for my husband. He loved them
He's the best there every was.
This is a super DVD with Bob Ross delivering his usual superior directions!
Very great and relaxing! I enjoy watching Bob Ross bring the canvas to life.
Bob Ross Joy of painting is great.  He makes painting look easy.  But with practicing along with Bob, anyone can learn to paint.  It's relaxing just to watch too.
Love watching Joy of Painting. Watching the show was is sooooo relaxing. Bob was the best.
Love watching Joy of Painting. Watching the show was is sooooo relaxing. Bob was the best.

As usual, Bob Ross shows do not disappoint.  Even if I'm not painting, I put on these DVD's to watch and relax!  Not only does his method of painting make it easy to paint, his presentation gives you courage to try, and encourages your visions to create!
Bob Ross's painting are superb and I will never get tired of watching him paint fall scenes.
Great video collection
Arrive and received as expected and described.

You either like Bob Ross's laidback style or you don't. We do. His quiet enthusiasm inspires us to pick up some brushes and get painting. Or you can just relax and enjoy his painting techniques. He was truly suis generis--we won't see his like again, but we can enjoy his paintings and instructions via DVD.
Love Bob Ross !!!!!
love watching bob ross
Always enjoy watching Bob Ross paint! He is very instructional and easy to follow with a humorous and light hearted approach.
My dad loved him.. So happy to get him the dvds for gifts

I was TERRIBLY DISAPPOINTED about the quality of ALL the DVD's I received.
The REAL reason I bought these DVD's is because I already have some videos which I downloaded from YouTube.
I downloaded seven seasons.
I was HOPING that after I bought these DVD's the quality would be MUCH better than what is on YouTube.
I have a very fast download connection (100mbs).

I have to assume that since these qualities SO POOR is because that at the time these DVD's were made (BEFORE the invention of the DVD) they were transferred from VHS to DVD.
Who ever created these DVD's do not have the knowledge or technology to make the transformation of VHS to DVD to look better.
Since this is ABOUT painting I was hoping the palette and the paintings would look much CLEARER.
I feel it's not fair that I paid such a high cost for such a low quality.
LOVED WATCHING ALL OF THE VIDEO I HAVE RECEIVED
ENJOYED THIS VIDEO
